Scaler - Class in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control
Translates an input value from a defined input range to a output value (with a defined output range) We support an asymmetric input range where the neutral inputNormal value is not in the middle.

setD(double) - Method in class ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control.PIDController
Changes the D parameter
This has two primary effects: Adds a "startup kick" and speeds up system response during setpoint changes Adds "drag" and slows the system when moving toward the target A small D value can be useful for both improving response times, and preventing overshoot.
setD(double) - Method in class ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes.PIDModeRule

setOutputRampRate(double) - Method in class ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control.PIDController
Set the maximum rate the output can increase per cycle.
